blocks.label: [number:0] + [number:0]
blocks.help: sum of the two operands

blocks.label: [number:0] - [number:0]
blocks.help: difference of the two operands

blocks.label: [number:0] * [number:0]
blocks.help: product of the two operands

blocks.label: [number:0] / [number:0]
blocks.help: quotient of the two operands

blocks.label: [number:0] = [number:0]
blocks.help: two operands are equal

blocks.label: [number:0] < [number:0]
blocks.help: first operand is less than second operand

blocks.label: [number:0] > [number:0]
blocks.help: first operand is greater than second operand

blocks.label: pick random [number:1] to [number:10]
blocks.help: random number between two numbers (inclusive)

blocks.label: [number:0] mod [number:0]
blocks.help: modulus of a number is the remainder after whole number division

blocks.label: round [number:0]
blocks.help: rounds to the nearest whole number

blocks.label: absolute of [number:10]
blocks.help: converts a negative number to positive, leaves positive alone

blocks.label: arccosine degrees of [number:10]
blocks.help: inverse of cosine

blocks.label: arcsine degrees of [number:10]
blocks.help: inverse of sine

blocks.label: arctangent degrees of [number:10]
blocks.help: inverse of tangent

blocks.label: ceiling of [number:10]
blocks.help: rounds up to nearest whole number

blocks.label: cosine of [number:10] degrees
blocks.help: ratio of the length of the adjacent side to the length of the hypotenuse

blocks.label: sine of [number:10] degrees
blocks.help: ratio of the length of the opposite side to the length of the hypotenuse

blocks.label: tangent of [number:10] degrees
blocks.help: ratio of the length of the opposite side to the length of the adjacent side

blocks.label: [number:10] to the power of [number:2]
blocks.help: multiply a number by itself the given number of times

blocks.label: square root of [number:10]
blocks.help: the square root is the same as taking the to the power of 1/2

blocks.label: pi
blocks.help: pi is the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter

blocks.label: tau
blocks.help: tau is 2 times pi, a generally more useful number
